SELECT SEQ_STROLL_BOARD.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_STROLL_BOARD (STROLL_BOARD_NUMBER, STROLL_BOARD_TITLE, STROLL_BOARD_CONTENT, STROLL_BOARD_LAT, STROLL_BOARD_LNG, STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_DATE, STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_PLACE, STROLL_BOARD_ADMIN_DISTRICT, STROLL_BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, STROLL_BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, USER_NUMBER, PET_NUMBER) VALUES(#{strollBoardNumber}, #{strollBoardTitle}, #{strollBoardContent}, #{strollBoardLat}, #{strollBoardLng}, #{strollBoardMeetingDate}, #{strollBoardMeetingPlace}, #{strollBoardAdminDistrict}, SYSDATE , SYSDATE, #{userNumber}, #{petNumber, jdbcType=INTEGER })
mapper.select: SELECT SB.STROLL_BOARD_NUMBER, SB.STROLL_BOARD_TITLE, SB.STROLL_BOARD_CONTENT, SB.STROLL_BOARD_LAT, SB.STROLL_BOARD_LNG, TO_CHAR(SB.STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_DATE, SB.STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_PLACE, SB.STROLL_BOARD_ADMIN_DISTRICT, TO_CHAR(SB.STROLL_BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STROLL_BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, TO_CHAR(SB.STROLL_BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STROLL_BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, U.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_ID, P.PET_NUMBER, P.PET_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.PET_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PET_BIRTH, P.PET_KIND, P.PET_DETAILED_TYPE, P.PET_GENDER, P.PET_SURGERY, PF.PET_FILE_NAME, PF.PET_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, PF.PET_FILE_UUID, SB.STROLL_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT FROM TBL_STROLL_BOARD SB JOIN TBL_USER U ON SB.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_PET P ON SB.PET_NUMBER = P.PET_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_PET_FILE PF ON P.PET_NUMBER = PF.PET_NUMBER WHERE SB.STROLL_BOARD_NUMBER = #{strollBoardNumber}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_STROLL_BOARD SET STROLL_BOARD_TITLE=#{strollBoardTitle}, STROLL_BOARD_CONTENT=#{strollBoardContent}, STROLL_BOARD_LAT=#{strollBoardLat}, STROLL_BOARD_LNG=#{strollBoardLng}, STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_DATE=#{strollBoardMeetingDate}, STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_PLACE=#{strollBoardMeetingPlace}, STROLL_BOARD_ADMIN_DISTRICT=#{strollBoardAdminDistrict}, STROLL_BOARD_UPDATE_DATE=SYSDATE, PET_NUMBER=#{petNumber} WHERE STROLL_BOARD_NUMBER = #{strollBoardNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT STROLL_BOARD_NUMBER, STROLL_BOARD_TITLE, STROLL_BOARD_CONTENT, STROLL_BOARD_LAT, STROLL_BOARD_LNG, TO_CHAR(STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_DATE, STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_PLACE, STROLL_BOARD_ADMIN_DISTRICT, USER_NUMBER, PET_NUMBER FROM TBL_STROLL_BOARD WHERE STROLL_BOARD_NUMBER = #{strollBoardNumber}

SELECT STROLL_BOARD_NUMBER,USER_NUMBER ,USER_ID, STROLL_BOARD_TITLE, STROLL_BOARD_CONTENT,STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_PLACE, STROLL_BOARD_ADMIN_DISTRICT, STROLL_BOARD_REGISTER_DATE, STROLL_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RN, U.USER_NUMBER ,U.USER_ID,STROLL_BOARD_NUMBER, STROLL_BOARD_TITLE, STROLL_BOARD_CONTENT,STROLL_BOARD_MEETING_PLACE, STROLL_BOARD_ADMIN_DISTRICT, TO_CHAR(STROLL_BOARD_REGISTER_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STROLL_BOARD_REGISTER_DATE,STROLL_BOARD_VIEW_COUNT FROM TBL_USER U JOIN TBL_STROLL_BOARD B ON U.USER_NUMBER = B.USER_NUMBER
WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
AND STROLL_BOARD_ADMIN_DISTRICT LIKE '%'||#{addressFirst}||'%'
AND STROLL_BOARD_ADMIN_DISTRICT LIKE '%'||#{addressSecond}||'%'
ORDER BY B.STROLL_BOARD_NUMBER DESC ) WHERE RN > #{size}
